name: Worn Light
description:
/!\ This game was created during a Game Jam and its development was suspended /!\

In this game you play a small sphere of light, and your objective is to find 11 fragments of paper.

Pay attention on your energy level, you lose energy along the party. If you need energy you can pickup light of lamps or supply the lamp with energy.

In the darkness have some monsters, avoid them to stay alive.

Controls :

  • Move : W/A/S/D
  • Jump : Spacebar
  • Interact : E
  • Grab object : G
  • Pause game : P
